resources.string: The update\'s cryptographic signature will be verified before flashing to confirm its origin, and no additional updates will be flashed. This mode is only compatible with TWRP.
Additional updates are flashed if present. Note that any (malicious) software package can place these updates and gain full system access. Caution is advised.
Flashing updates in the current mode is only supported on TWRP recoveries. Please make sure you are running a compatible recovery before continuing.

Flashing updates in the current mode is only officially supported on TWRP recoveries. Official CWM builds are not supported, though some community-built versions of CWM may still work. Please make sure you are running a compatible recovery before continuing.
Additional updates are present in the FlashAfterUpdate folder, but secure mode is enabled. If you continue, these additional updates will not be flashed.
